definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
tip/end/final stage/latter part/inessential detail/powder/dust/opera role of old man

sentences.english: A kid then runs up to Rima and hugs her.
sentences.chinese: 然後運行一個孩子到璃茉和擁抱她。

sentences.english: The chapter begins with Rima and her parents discussing a divorce.
sentences.chinese: 這個章節由璃茉和他的父母討論離婚開始。

sentences.english: He understands, and soon goes change to Nadeshiko, who Rima glomps.
sentences.chinese: 他明白她的意思，並很快變成撫子，和璃茉一起走。

sentences.english: Mo which, heavily fine, the head start quality.
sentences.chinese: 那一茉豐腴細膩，先聲奪人的品質。

sentences.english: That he thinks the flower was in Rima's smile.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲，那朵花，就是璃茉的微笑。

sentences.english: Kusukusu comments that Rima dislike being call cute and that she wants to make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 嘻嘻覺得璃茉討厭別人說她可愛但她要讓人發笑。

sentences.english: As he walks he spots Rima curl up in a ball.
sentences.chinese: 當他走時，他看到璃茉捲曲成一個球。

sentences.english: Rima then comes back, with the kid who now fallen asleep.
sentences.chinese: 璃茉然後和睡著了的孩子回來。

definition: used in the transliteration of people's names
(phonetic na)/used esp. in female names such as Anna 安娜[An1 na4] or Diana 黛安娜[Dai4 an1 na4]
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
angelica (type of iris)/plant root used in TCM
